channel.title: Help adding html
channel.description: alright well i have all the website files and stuff for the 2006 runescape website and i know i have to basically put it into a website but how do i do this like wat website creator do i do? and how do i add all of it

item.title: Help adding html
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

master roshi:

alright well i have all the website files and stuff for the 2006 runescape website and i know i have to basically put it into a website but how do i do this like wat website creator do i do? and how do i add all of it

By website creator I assume you mean webhost, so go to a free webhosting site such as http://www.000webhost.com and sign up, from there you add your domain by pointing the nameservers at the 000webhost ones, then you go to your cPanel and upload your files and work magic.

Read full topic
